data.name: Tuning Champions
data.detailed_description:
Tuning Champions is a PvP Multiplayer Racing Game. The objective is to race against other players to earn money. Utelize the money to upgrade and customize your vehicle in order to win!

Featuring

  • - 15player Multiplayer
  • - Complex Vehicle Tuning
  • - Polygon Art Style

Tuning Champions features a complex vehicle tuning system with presets, visual effects and more!

Vehicle Tuning Options (for each vehicle)

  • - 25+ Skins
  • - 25+ Rims
  • - 5+ Front & Rear Bumper
  • - 5+ Hoods, Spoiler etc.
  • - Custom Exhaust Smokes
  • - Custom Light Colors
  • and even more...

data.short_description: Tuning Champions is a PvP Multiplayer Racing Game where you have to earn money by racing to upgrade your vehicle and beat the others! Featuring full vehicle tuning, low poly style and a lot of fun! Earn money and upgrade your vehicle to beat the others!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX950 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3.00GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX1070
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS X Yosemite (10.10)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX950 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX1050
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX950 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
